author: Jessica

text: 1. Candy salad season! Having this in a large apothecary jar makes the month so much more fun. 2. Desperately want to make this chocolate granola. 3. Sort of wish that it was Valentine’s season all year round so we could wear red+pink daily. Maybe that should be my resolution! 4. You’ll never get off the dinner treadmill. WOW so true. 5. TV things!! I may binge Younger again now that it’s on netflix. The season finale of Landman… wow! 6. At this point I think our entire family knows every single word to the Wicked soundtrack. We listen to it nonstop. Hearing Jordan hit the notes is hilarious. 7. How to create meaningful changes this year. 8. Send me all your new favorite podcast recs below!
html:
1. Candy salad season! Having this in a large apothecary jar makes the month so much more fun.

2. Desperately want to make this chocolate granola.

3. Sort of wish that it was Valentine’s season all year round so we could wear red+pink daily. Maybe that should be my resolution!

4. You’ll never get off the dinner treadmill. WOW so true.

5. TV things!! I may binge Younger again now that it’s on netflix. The season finale of Landman… wow!

6. At this point I think our entire family knows every single word to the Wicked soundtrack. We listen to it nonstop. Hearing Jordan hit the notes is hilarious.

7. How to create meaningful changes this year.

8. Send me all your new favorite podcast recs below!
